title: Increased Head Drops
description_short: An additional way to get Creeper, Zombie, Skeleton, and Player head drops
description: Creepers, Zombies, Skeletons, and Players gain a rare chance to drop their heads when killed by players

features.label: Player heads will drop when killed by a charged Creeper. Player heads have a rare chance of being dropped when killed by another player
Zombie, Skeleton, and Creeper heads have a rare chance of being dropped when killed by a player
Steve heads can be found as rare loot in chests in Dungeons, Woodland mansions, Jungle temples, Bastions, and Strongholds
Utilises Bastion loot-table changes in Minecraft 1.16.2
Alternative Download for compatablitiy with Renewable Pigstep (Minecraft 1.16)
